Reviews.Title: “Renovation complete, nice place”
Reviews.Author: cincinnatalie
Reviews.Content: little concerned based reviews renovations assuming wouldnt construction nye weekend chance dont renovations nice previous experiences fairfield inn pros 1 nice modern lobby simple fireplace seating free cookies coffee ice water simple market convenience store food toiletry staples 2 continental breakfast low expectations continental breakfast apples oranges bananas bagels english muffins hard boiled eggs waffle batter iron cereals granola yogurt coffee juices microwaveable jimmy dean breakfast sandwiches corn dogs assortment peanut butter honey cream cheese etc 3 clean modern decor admittedly favorite color green modern simple lines beds comfy nice bathroom etc 4 free wifi sign free entire stay 5 nice free shampoo conditioner intensive care lotion replenished daily notes middle chain hell depending view theres target walmart close stayed easy access head east 20 min beale street cons 1 chintzy towels honestly didnt fit doing overall 2 elevator slow crazy hot easily accessible stairs 3 floors nice hotel money paid happy experience

Reviews.Content: stayed night texas easy close restaurants street mall fairfield kept pretty beds pillows comfortable indoor pool ok little chilly texas standards poolhot tub little rundown safe plenty variety breakfastjust lot seating priced little probably stay passing
